title: Unknown
description: Living among mortals, the djinn Cassiel has developed a reluctant affection for themâ€”especially for Warden Luis Rocha. As the mystery deepens around the kidnapping of innocent Warden children, Cassiel and Luis are the only ones who can investigate both the human and djinn realms. But the trail will lead them to a traitor who may be more powerful than they can handle...
author: Rachel Caine
